class.name: Tweener
class.brief_description: Abstract class for all Tweeners used by [Tween].
class.description: Tweeners are objects that perform a specific animating task, e.g. interpolating a property or calling a method at a given time. A [Tweener] can't be created manually, you need to use a dedicated method from [Tween].

signal.name: finished
signal.description: Emitted when the [Tweener] has just finished its job or became invalid (e.g. due to a freed object).
